Articles.Content:
The train is going BEYOND THE THEORETICAL LIMITS OF SANITY HOW FAST MUST WE GO?

Faster still! Onwards until release! Prepare to eject from train in thirty... twenty-nine...

do we have people stalking the twitter?

people outside harvesters house yet?
This is painfully hype-y!!!!
Meh, I'm going back to my video editing. May as well get something productive done. I'll check back in an hour.

HA! KSP crashes at start up!

Even the 0.90 crew is on the hype train apparently.

Helm HypePlaid Factor 9

Engage

do we have people stalking the twitter?

people outside harvesters house yet?

I'm stalking the twitter, SteamDB, and the website along with the forums. I stalked the reddit AMA last night.

do we have people stalking the twitter?

people outside harvesters house yet?

MaxMaps hasn't posted in 9 hours.

Post rate is accelerating to ludicrous speed!

Pah, we're coming up on Plaid factor five now!
The only way the hype train will reach max speed is if we play a neat song, how about this?:

I tried, but I can't concentrate on account of all the HYPE

No kidding. And I've got to go to school!

You're excited about this. You also seem to have been on the forums for longer than I've slept for. Are you feeling okay?

Okay? I don't know the meaning of the word!

Actually, I went to bed a around 10, local time. Then I slept like a 6-year old on Christmas eve. "Is that the sun rising!" "KSP must be out!"
Back from school. I haven't played KSP for 4 and half months but hype is unreal. I am really looking forward to getting back into this game.

Wow... I leave for 2 minutes to watch the metal KSP song and there's another 2 pages.

C'mon Squad! 8AM local time release please?

HA! KSP crashes at start up!

Even the 0.90 crew is on the hype train apparently.

*tries from steam*

Nope, loads fine. Also loads near instantly with DDS'd textures and no mods.
Oh LOL, I just realized that I had accidentially removed the SQUAD and NASA stuff from Gamedata, hopefully the update will refresh those.

Helm HypePlaid Factor 9

Engage

Aye Capt'n. HypePlaid factor 9.

http://kerbalx.com/countdown

KerbalX predicts it's less than 20 minutes until release(It, again, is just an prediction)

Last thing I remember was

hitting F5 and

it was very dark outside.

Now I see it is

a bright new morning.

Must have hit pillow

shaped warp to next morn button

yay 1.0 hype.
I'm actually surprised it didn't crash due to the lack of parts......

*tries from steam*

Nope, loads fine. Also loads near instantly with DDS'd textures and no mods.

Its just my modded copy that crashed at start up. I just take it as a sign I'm suppose to wait

Okay? I don't know the meaning of the word!

Actually, I went to bed a around 10, local time. Then I slept like a 6-year old on Christmas eve. "Is that the sun rising!" "KSP must be out!"

Oh. Hello, other me.

I think I'll do verify steam cache just in case.

- - - Updated - - -

Is it me or do the thread posts keep shifting around a bit?
When I finish reading a page there's two new ones to read!!! What is this witchcraft!?!??!?
